How to get support Web Submission Web Submission, phone5 Web Submission, Phone

Unlimited cases

Unlimited cases
Architecture/Advisory Support General guidance Customer specific architectural support such as design reviews, performance tuning, configuration and implementation assistance delivered by Microsoft Azure technical specialists.
Training Azure web seminars, on-demand training
Onsite Support
Proactive Guidance
Pricing Free Free Items highlighted in blue are paid advanced services.

1 Customers purchasing through Online Service Standard Agreement (OSSA) are eligible for Developer support plan, at no charge. For whom the account charge amount accumulate above RMB50,000 in 3 contiguously months (since Dec 15th, 2018) will be qualified to use Azure Standard support for 1 year.

2 Customers purchasing through Online Service Premier Agreement (OSPA) are eligible for Standard support plan, at no charge.

3 Advanced services in Premier support plan (highlighted in blue above) should be purchased through support team technology licensor, please contact your account manager for details.

4 Response times during business hours.

5 Phone submission working hours is from 9am to 9pm, Mon-Sun since Dec 1st, 2018.

umbTextpage.pageTitle: Azure Support Plan – Azure Cloud Computing
umbTextpage.metaDescription: Compare features of Azure support plans for customers from developers, starting in the cloud to enterprise to deploy critical and strategic business applications in Azure.
umbTextpage.banner: Azure Support Plan
